alert.note: Alert for Lewis (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 06 at 5:31PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...SHOWERS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF EASTERN LEWIS AND SOUTHWESTERN SCIOTO COUNTIES THROUGH 545 PM EDT... At 530 PM EDT, showers were located along a line extending from 11 miles northeast of Rome to near Head of Grassy, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Portsmouth, New Boston, Head of Grassy, Rosemount, Camp Dix, Saint Paul, Firebrick, West Portsmouth, Tannery, Emerson, Friendship, Garrison, Rexton and Turkey Creek Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
